seo.title: Facundo Pascale's Portfolio - Web/Mobile Developer with 4 years of experience
seo.description: Hire Facundo to build your web or mobile application. Web and Mobile Developer specialized in creating stunning applications.
hero.title: Hey, I'm Facundo
hero.description: +4 years of experience. Web / Mobile Developer. Specialized in crafting unique applications.
experience.title: Work Experience
experience.freelance.title: Web / Mobile Cross-Platform Developer
experience.freelance.description: I'm a freelance web and mobile developer with experience in React Native, React.js, Next.js, Astro, and Expo. I've worked on a variety of projects, from mobile apps to websites, always focused on delivering creative and functional solutions. I'm ready to take your ideas to the next level!
experience.desafio-latam.title: Web Development Instructor
experience.desafio-latam.description: As a front-end development instructor at Desaf√≠o Latam, I am dedicated to training future developers in an intensive six-month program. I am responsible for teaching classes and grading challenges and evaluations. I provide instruction in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and jQuery, guiding students in using Vue 3 to create dynamic web applications.
experience.magnetico.title: Cross-platform Web/Mobile Developer
experience.magnetico.description: Responsible for the development of the company's mobile solutions, participating in the planning and execution of the same in different teams
experience.leniolabs.title: Web / Mobile Cross-Platform Developer
experience.leniolabs.description: Participation in multicultural teams with diverse technologies. Responsible for front-end development and occasionally for UI libraries designed for specific clients.
experience.coderhouse.title: Teacher and Tutor - Cross-Platform Mobile Development
experience.coderhouse.description: As a teacher, my responsibilities included live class delivery, grading mid-/end-of-course projects, and coordinating the team to provide the best possible experience for students.
experience.learsoft.title: Cross-Platform Mobile Developer
experience.learsoft.description: Responsible for the development of a virtual wallet, assisting my colleagues, reviewing pull requests, and participating in project planning.
projects.title: Projects
aboutme.title: About Me
aboutme.description_1: Hi! I'm Facundo Pascale, a web and mobile app developer committed to creatively solving problems.
aboutme.description_2: I'm known for my dedication, interpersonal skills, and ability to lead and make decisions.
aboutme.description_3: I love tackling challenges and working in teams to achieve exceptional results.
